mapper.select: SELECT YCT_LOGIC_CARD_NO FROM yct GROUP BY YCT_LOGIC_CARD_NO HAVING count(YCT_LOGIC_CARD_NO) >= 7

SELECT * FROM yct WHERE YCT_LOGIC_CARD_NO IN (SELECT YCT_LOGIC_CARD_NO FROM yct GROUP BY YCT_LOGIC_CARD_NO HAVING count(YCT_LOGIC_CARD_NO) >= 7 ORDER BY count(YCT_LOGIC_CARD_NO)) ORDER BY YCT_LOGIC_CARD_NO
